## Reproducibility {#Reproducibility}

**Source Files for Reproducibility**

This project has been written using the R package `Bookdown`. For reproducibility, all source files and data are available on my GitHub repository [here](https://github.com/twoshotamericano/Thesis). To recreate this document just clone the repository and save it in the Thesis folder at the following location `C:/ThesisSource/Thesis`.

**Session info for Reproducibility**

The R session info when compiling this book is shown below:

```{r SessionInfo, echo=FALSE}
sessionInfo()

```
